message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we try $15000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm still not willing to go that low, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $14000?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd love to get a bit closer to it. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we're getting close to a deal. How about we meet in the middle again? I'll sell it to you for $13750?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'd be willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider that?
